H0.text: For navigation is how the compass has historically been used.

H1.text: The compass has historically been used to predict weather.

H2.text: To measure temperature has historically been how the compass has been used.

H3.text: For mineral identification, the compass has historically been used.

A4.text: The magnetic compass was first invented as a device for divination and later adopted for navigation by the Song dynasty Chinese during the 11th century.

A5.text: Compasses are typically used to show cardinal directions for navigation and geographic orientation.
